title: File Upload
description: A component for selecting and uploading files.

basicUsage.title: Basic Usage
basicUsage.description: You can select files using input type='file'.

fileTypes.title: File Type Restrictions
fileTypes.description: You can restrict to specific file types using the accept attribute.

multiple.title: Multiple File Selection
multiple.description: You can select multiple files at once using the multiple attribute.

scss.title: SCSS Styling
scss.description: You can apply file input styles using podo-ui mixins.
